message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $200. I believe it's a great deal and will be valuable to you.
That price is way too high for me.  I'd be willing to pay $75.
I understand your position, Bob, but $75 is significantly below its value. How about we meet in the middle at $175?
It seems like we're still far apart on price. I could go up to $90, but that's my absolute limit.
